contentItem.name: com.silabs.content.demos.c8051f970dk.kit.si8051.c8051f970dk.demo.f97x_ports_portmatch
contentItem.label: Ports PortMatch

property.value: Wake from Idle using Port Match

contentItem.description:
Wake from Idle using Port Match

This example project shows how to wakeup the MCU from Idle Mode using
the Port Match feature.

The user can press button BTN03 to wake the MCU and toggle LED05.
Power consumption can be measured by connecting an ammeter to JP3.
